title: Дублёр
overview: The infamous football player Anton Korolev swaps bodies with a simple courier after an accident with a falling elevator. Anton's body is in a coma, and now he has to live someone else's and very earthly life, where there is no more fame and money, but there is someone else's wife and children to take care of. In addition, watching what is happening from the outside, Korolev sees the real motives of his past environment, which makes him look at the world differently.
